name: Vacation Roulette
description: Created in the 24 hour hackathon, "Hack DFW", VacationRoulette is a service that allows for one to find a vacation quickly without much planning. This was a collaboration with Rahat Ahmed and Zack Urben.

name: EZEDIT
description: Created in the 24 hour hackathon, "Hack UTD", EZEDIT is a platform as a service designed to make it easy for site builders to allow their end users the ability to update content on their web pages. This was a collaboration with Rahat Ahmed and Zack Urben.
